content: attention this pattern is free developed by stefani pereira this pattern cannot be sold or shared by prints you can sell the final piece or share the ravelry link and send it to your friends this is a pattern to crochet cute starfish not the finished amigurumi the pattern is a pdf document with written instructions on how to crochet the starfish accompanied by explanatory pictures the finished starfish should be around 10cm / 4 the final size depends on how you work and on the kind of hook and yarn used contact me on instagram to provide me with your feedback and if you shall have any doubt about the instructions please mention pattern by @cheery_atelie when posting online i hope do you liked this pattern i made with much love <3 don t forget the share with your friends
